question: Sudip Datta Bhowmik, the noted journalist was shot dead. He hailed from which state?
explanation: Sudip Datta Bhowmik (49), the noted journalist was shot dead under mysterious circumstances at a battalion headquarters of Tripura State Rifles (TSR) near Agartala on November 21, 2017. He was working for a vernacular daily \'Syandan Patrikaand\' and was also contributing to local television channel \'News Vanguard\'.
